channel.title: Why cant i login on offline on my server? says ERROR CONNECTING 2 SERVER?
channel.description:
It's not even letting me login offline?!
I have my server online like well i turned it on and then i try logging in offline and nothing please help.. How come im getting an error message myself now? i dont understand? i added my ip to the client.java file? i had to redownload the client and source so do i have to go threw all that port fowarding and no-ip thing again? The error message is when i open client and try to login. it say's "error connecting to server"

item.title: Why cant i login on offline on my server? says ERROR CONNECTING 2 SERVER?

i only compiled my client not server should i do both?
